ing: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed golden mushroom soup
des: "I made this simple (but delicious) dish for my boyfriend, and by the end of the meal, I could tell I had graduated to 'prospective mate' status.  That was 26 years ago, and I'm still making it for him. This is best served over wide egg noodles."
ins: In a Dutch oven over medium-high heat, sear beef on all sides. Stir in onion, and saute until golden brown. Add mushrooms, butter, mushroom soup and wine. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 2 hours.
